ygData.subject: Re: MeowMix
ygData.msgSnippet: Trinity:: She heard the others in the trees and walked over to see what was going on. She still had tears in her eyes, but then she looked at the squirrel bot.

Trinity::

She heard the others in the trees and walked over to see what was 
going on. She still had tears in her eyes, but then she looked at the 
squirrel bot. It was bigger than she was. She smiled an said in a 
soft, friendly voice,"Hello there. Are you OK? Don't be scared. We're 
not going to hurt you. You can be our friend if you want. My name is 
Trinity. What's your name?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Scrat::
> 
> Scrat tried to run off again as he hears Windlord's voice, but 
trips 
> over a root and falls, a small yelp issuing from him as he hits his 
> hand. He curles up into a little ball (in robot mode), trembling 
> uncontrollably.
> 
>
